seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Definition & Basic Concepts
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: What is <DISEASE_NAME>, and how is it generally defined in medical literature?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Establish a clear, high-level understanding of the disease.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Synonyms & Terminology
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Are there any alternative names, historical terms, or specific subtypes commonly used to describe <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Explore the different terms used in clinical and research contexts.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Historical Perspective & Etymology
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: How was <DISEASE_NAME> historically perceived or treated, and what is the origin of its name?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Provide historical context and evolution of understanding.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Epidemiology
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Which demographics are most at risk for <DISEASE_NAME>, and what are its incidence/prevalence rates globally?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Cover geographic and population-level data.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Etiology & Causes
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: What are the primary factors (environmental, genetic, lifestyle) that initiate or exacerbate <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Identify root causes and risk factors for disease onset.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Pathophysiology
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Which core biological processes (immune, genetic, metabolic) underlie <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Focus on mechanisms that drive disease development.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Signs & Symptoms
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: What are the key clinical features of <DISEASE_NAME>, and how do they present in mild vs. severe cases?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Summarize typical clinical presentations.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Diagnosis & Clinical Evaluation
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Which methods—physical exam findings, patient history, lab tests—are most pivotal to diagnosing <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Cover both basic and advanced diagnostic approaches.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Dermatoscopic Diagnosis
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: What characteristic dermatoscopic patterns help distinguish <DISEASE_NAME> from other similar conditions?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Focus on non-invasive visualization techniques.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Histopathologic Findings
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Which microscopic tissue changes (e.g., inflammatory markers, structural alterations) are indicative of <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Summarize biopsy-based diagnostic clues.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Molecular Analysis & Biomarkers
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Which molecular pathways and biomarkers are currently studied or used to understand <DISEASE_NAME> more precisely?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Highlight genetic or serological factors.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Subtypes & Variants
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: How is <DISEASE_NAME> classified into different subtypes, and what clinical traits define each variant?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Outline the disease spectrum.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Disease in Pregnancy
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: How does <DISEASE_NAME> manifest or progress during pregnancy, and what special considerations apply to treatment?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Address hormonal and safety issues relevant to pregnant patients.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Comorbidities & Complexity
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: What other conditions (e.g., asthma, arthritis, metabolic disorders) commonly co-occur with <DISEASE_NAME>, and how do they influence management?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Explore multi-system interactions.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Psychological/Mental Health Impact
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: How does <DISEASE_NAME> affect mental health, and which strategies (e.g., counseling, support groups) can mitigate psychological stress?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Highlight the psychosocial dimension of chronic skin disease.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Communication with Patient
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Which strategies and educational approaches can improve understanding and adherence among patients with <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Emphasize patient-centered communication.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Lifestyle & Preventive Measures
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: How can lifestyle, diet, or environmental modifications help in preventing or minimizing <DISEASE_NAME> flares?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Highlight non-pharmacological strategies.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Treatment & Management
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Which first-line therapies, second-line options, and advanced treatments (e.g., biologics) exist for <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Cover standard treatments, emerging options, and their effectiveness.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Infection Risks & Preventive Measures
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: How can patients with <DISEASE_NAME> reduce the risk of secondary infections, and what prophylactic measures might be needed?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Focus on complications involving opportunistic or secondary infections.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Pediatric & Geriatric Considerations
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Does <DISEASE_NAME> manifest differently in children or older adults, and how should treatment be adapted?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Discuss life-stage variations in disease presentation and management.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Multidisciplinary Collaboration
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Which other specialists (e.g., rheumatology, endocrinology) might be involved in caring for <DISEASE_NAME>, and how is cross-specialty communication handled?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Emphasize team-based care for complex or comorbid cases.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Prognosis & Long-Term Outlook
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: What is the expected disease course, and which factors predict a favorable or poor outcome in <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Address remission rates, chronicity, and complications.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Recommendations for Structured Follow-Up
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: What follow-up schedule and evaluation methods are recommended for patients with <DISEASE_NAME> to track disease progression?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Cover best practices for ongoing patient monitoring.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Telemedicine & Remote Management
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Can <DISEASE_NAME> be effectively evaluated or managed via teledermatology, and what are the limitations?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Outline best practices for remote consultations.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Research & Emerging Therapies
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: What are the latest findings or recent studies focusing on <DISEASE_NAME>, and what do they suggest for future care?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Highlight ongoing research or noteworthy publications.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Future Directions for Treatment
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: What novel or investigational therapies are on the horizon for <DISEASE_NAME>, and how might they improve patient outcomes?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Include pipeline treatments or clinical trials.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Public Health Perspective
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: How do public health initiatives or guidelines address <DISEASE_NAME> at a population level?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Discuss screening, prevention campaigns, or community interventions.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Culture & Ethnic Considerations
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Which cultural or ethnic factors might influence the presentation, perception, or treatment of <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Address cultural beliefs, genetic predispositions, or differences in skin types.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Cost & Insurance Considerations
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: How might cost or insurance coverage influence treatment decisions for <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Discuss real-world barriers to care and potential solutions.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Ethical & Legal Aspects
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Are there any ethical concerns, consent issues, or medicolegal challenges commonly arising with <DISEASE_NAME>?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Cover patient autonomy, consent for procedures, or rare legal cases.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Multi-Step Clinical Reasoning
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Outline a step-by-step diagnostic approach for a complex case of <DISEASE_NAME> involving ambiguous findings, from patient history to final treatment decision.
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Encourage systematic chain-of-thought and detailed reasoning steps.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Conflict or Contradiction Resolution
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Discuss how to handle contradictory results (e.g., negative biopsy but suspicious dermatoscopic exam) for <DISEASE_NAME> and propose next steps.
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Model must resolve inconsistent or conflicting data logically.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Differential Diagnosis with Ambiguous Data
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Present at least three alternative diagnoses when <DISEASE_NAME> has overlapping symptoms with other conditions, and specify which further data is needed to confirm or exclude each.
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Promote multi-hypothesis generation and data-driven decision-making.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Prioritization & Triage
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Given multiple patients showing signs of <DISEASE_NAME> at varying severity levels, determine who should be assessed first and justify your triage order.
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Assess urgency based on clinical severity and risk of complications.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Cost-Benefit & Real-World Constraints
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Propose a management plan for <DISEASE_NAME> in a patient with limited financial resources or insurance restrictions.
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Demonstrate practical decision-making under real-world constraints.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Complex Comorbidities
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Outline a treatment strategy for <DISEASE_NAME> in a patient with two additional comorbidities (e.g., diabetes and rheumatoid arthritis) and consider potential drug interactions or dose adjustments.
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Integrate multiple conditions and their treatment implications.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Evidence Synthesis & Guideline Comparison
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Compare at least two clinical guidelines for <DISEASE_NAME> and reconcile any conflicting recommendations into a unified care approach.
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Practice cross-referencing guidelines and forming a cohesive plan.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: What-If Scenario Analysis
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: If a patient with <DISEASE_NAME> develops an unexpected complication (e.g., severe drug reaction), how would you adjust the treatment plan and coordinate care?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Test the model’s adaptability to unforeseen changes.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Incomplete or Evolving Data
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Describe how you would manage <DISEASE_NAME> while waiting for key lab results or biopsy outcomes. What provisional treatments or precautions would you take?
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Address decision-making in uncertain or partial-data scenarios.

seed_tasks_for_disease.title: Reflective & Meta-Cognitive Prompt
seed_tasks_for_disease.prompt: Discuss common cognitive biases (e.g., anchoring bias) that may lead to delayed or incorrect diagnosis of <DISEASE_NAME>, and propose strategies to mitigate them.
seed_tasks_for_disease.description: Encourage self-critical thinking and error-prevention awareness.
